C

CardReaderControllerManager - Class in de.gematik.ti.cardreader.access
This manager object provides functionalities over all CardReaderController and CardReaderProviders to request all available card readers and information’s about CardReaderProviders (e.g. licence, description).
cardReaderProviderAvailable() - Method in class de.gematik.ti.cardreader.access.CardReaderControllerManager
Check if card reader provider found by the service loader

D

de.gematik.ti.cardreader.access - package de.gematik.ti.cardreader.access
 

G

getCardReaderControllers() - Method in class de.gematik.ti.cardreader.access.CardReaderControllerManager
Create a collection with card reader controllers for all card reader providers
getCardReaderProviderDescriptors() - Method in class de.gematik.ti.cardreader.access.CardReaderControllerManager
Create a collection with all card reader provider descriptor objects found by the service loader
getCardReaderProviderNames() - Method in class de.gematik.ti.cardreader.access.CardReaderControllerManager
Create a collection with all card reader provider names found by the service loader
getCardReaders() - Method in class de.gematik.ti.cardreader.access.CardReaderControllerManager
Create a collection with all card reader found by card reader providers
getInstance() - Static method in class de.gematik.ti.cardreader.access.CardReaderControllerManager
Get the singleton instance

I

ICardReaderControllerInitializer - Interface in de.gematik.ti.cardreader.access
The implementing class for ´ICardReaderControllerInitializer´ interface will initialize CardReaderController e.g. inject android application context or prepare environment.
initialize(ICardReaderControllerInitializer) - Method in class de.gematik.ti.cardreader.access.CardReaderControllerManager
The special and optional functionality is the initializer method for CardReaderController.
initializeCardReaderController(ICardReaderController) - Method in interface de.gematik.ti.cardreader.access.ICardReaderControllerInitializer
Called with the ICardReaderController implementation to initialize
